content.title: Applying for a financial order
content.formallyStartFinancialProceedings: To formally start financial proceedings, you'll also need to complete another form (known as Form A) and pay another fee.
content.sendFormA: You can send Form A at the same time as you apply for your divorce, or at any time after that. However, the court won't start processing your request for a financial order until you submit Form A and pay the fee.
content.linkToMoreGuidance: You'll be given a link to more guidance on financial orders and Form A when you finish your divorce application.
